github.*: Any time any event is triggered (Wildcard Event).
github.commit_comment: Any time a Commit is commented on.
github.create: Any time a Branch or Tag is created.
github.delete: Any time a Branch or Tag is deleted.
github.deployment: Any time a Repository has a new deployment created from the API.
github.deployment_status: Any time a deployment for a Repository has a status update from the API.
github.fork: Any time a Repository is forked.
github.gollum: Any time a Wiki page is updated.
github.issue_comment: Any time a comment on an issue is created, edited, or deleted.
github.issues: Any time an Issue is assigned, unassigned, labeled, unlabeled, opened, edited, milestoned, demilestoned, closed, or reopened.
github.label: Any time a Label is created, edited, or deleted.
github.member: Any time a User is added or removed as a collaborator to a Repository, or has their permissions modified.
github.membership: Any time a User is added or removed from a team. Organization hooks only.
github.milestone: Any time a Milestone is created, closed, opened, edited, or deleted.
github.organization: Any time a user is added, removed, or invited to an Organization. Organization hooks only.
github.org_block: Any time an organization blocks or unblocks a user. Organization hooks only.
github.page_build: Any time a Pages site is built or results in a failed build.
github.project_card: Any time a Project Card is created, edited, moved, converted to an issue, or deleted.
github.project_column: Any time a Project Column is created, edited, moved, or deleted.
github.project: Any time a Project is created, edited, closed, reopened, or deleted.
github.public: Any time a Repository changes from private to public.
github.pull_request_review_comment: Any time a comment on a pull request's unified diff is created, edited, or deleted (in the Files Changed tab).
github.pull_request_review: Any time a pull request review is submitted, edited, or dismissed.
github.pull_request: Any time a pull request is assigned, unassigned, labeled, unlabeled, opened, edited, closed, reopened, or synchronized (updated due to a new push in the branch that the pull request is tracking). Also any time a pull request review is requested, or a review request is removed.
github.push: Any Git push to a Repository, including editing tags or branches. Commits via API actions that update references are also counted. This is the default event.
github.repository: Any time a Repository is created, deleted (organization hooks only), made public, or made private.
github.release: Any time a Release is published in a Repository.
github.status: Any time a Repository has a status update from the API
github.team: Any time a team is created, deleted, modified, or added to or removed from a repository. Organization hooks only
github.team_add: Any time a team is added or modified on a Repository.
github.watch: Any time a User stars a Repository.
